Texts.Chs: 虽然蚁族人都是食肉动物，但除了保护巢穴外，它们没有侵略性。这是一件好事，因为现在它们已经学会了向宇宙中产卵，并在宇宙中传播。它们的数量很快就会激增。保护案例手册C45631-N的B子条款中提到这是C类潜在威胁。
Texts.Eng: While carnivorous, the Thelusians are not territorial or aggressive save when protecting the Hive. This is a good thing, because now that they have learned they can Spore (the term used for their spreading of eggs) into space to spread through the cosmos their population will be booming quite soon. This has been referred to in Protectorate casebook C45631-N, sub-clause B as a Type C potential threat.
